modShortDescription: Whether you need to travel to far away places or just to get away from those pesky zombies, this helicopter will get the job done while riding in style.
modDescription:
This mod is based around the idea of traveling faster. Whether you need to travel to far away places or just to get away from those pesky zombies, this [helicopter](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) will get the job done while riding in style.

ActiniumTiger put together this design from the MI 17 model, re-textured to fit the theme and added particle effects. He hope you all like what he put together. Enjoy!

* **Vehicle Name:** Mi-17
* **3D Model Artist Name:** [msart](https://www.cgtrader.com/msart)
* All Models in this mod are subject to [Creative Commons License](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

No Models have been altered from the ‘original creator’ they are set up with an extra overlay texture and appropriate lighting in unity for 7 Days to Die game.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1cFpeSpWW56j6jEnXuYNOXfFj8f67u0ye)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23220-mi-17/).

**Credits:** ActiniumTiger, Ragsy
